author: Findeton
title: #20 Fe, familia y odio al progresismo: el poder de los evangélicos latinos se extiende por Estados Unidos
text:
[blodhemn](/user/blodhemn)a [elpais.com](/go/link/3942841) [#4](c4#c-4) Es una manera de verlo. Otra es que unos cuantos españoles se han marchado a países menos corruptos, han visto que se vive mejor así y evitan votar a los partidos que mantienen aquí niveles indecentes de corrupción.
Pero hay de todo…
[#4](c4#c-4) te recomiendo algo más de fibra en tu dieta, parece que aún no has digerido el que no ganaran los tuyos
[#4](c4#c-4) que yo conozca la gente que emigra a EEUU normalmente son gente con títulos superiores donde irse a América es muy buena opción laboral, y ya esta, si votan a la izquierda española sera porque ven desde fuera que es mejor opción.
Que pasa con los que votan a la derecha?
Que significaria?
Por cierto a mayor nivel de estudios el votante de izquierda aumenta, tampoco dices nada de eso?
Y los testigos de Jehová. Antes estaban a la salida de los hospitales con sus plafones. Ahora los veo en: la salida del metro, de los parques y en cualquier esquina o paseo. De 3 en 3. Si no les miras no te molestan, al menos en mi experiencia, pero me parece preocupante cómo van invadiendo el espacio público para su negocio de proselitismo religioso. ¿Puedo plantar un plafón con folletos de mi empresa 7 u 8 horas allá dónde me apetezca y abordar a los transeúntes?
[#3](c3#c-3) al igual que llevan toda la vida ocupando espacio publico los mendigos, los que reparten folletos, los grupos de turistas guiados.... mientras la ocupacion no sea permanente, no hay problema
[#3](c3#c-3) En mi pequeña ciudad de 40k habitantes el otro día me crucé a cuatro así, todos eran latinos. Les dije con palabras poco amables que se fueran con sus historias a su templo, que la calle no era lugar para ello. Eran muy ridículos, hablaban con una grandiosidad típica de pastor evangélico y que si la gloria de dios y mierdas así. Llamé a la policía. Me parece sumamente preocupante esto. Uno de ellos aún venía con ese falso buen rollo a "debatir" conmigo y me hacía preguntas de lo más ridículas. Largo de la calle por favor.
Yo lo llamaría "fe seudocristiana", porque muchas veces esto no está movido por una fe religiosa, sino que la fe religiosa es solo el medio para mover otra cosa, por ejemplo, mantener a la gente distraída odiando el aborto o a los homosexuales mientras no se dan cuenta de que otros se están quedando con la mayor parte de su esfuerzo al trabajar.
La religión era prácticamente la única cosa de LATAM que EEUU no controlaba, pero con el evangelismo es probable que en una década o dos reemplace al catolicismo en cantidad de seguidores.

author: جواد تاجی
title: هم‌بنیان‌گذار xAI از استارتاپ هوش مصنوعی ایلان ماسک جدا شد
text:
استراتژی رشد
همبنیانگذار xAI از استارتاپ هوش مصنوعی ایلان ماسک جدا شد
او با انتشار یک پست طولانی از خروج خود خبر داده و همچنین درباره تجربه کار کردنش با ایلان ماسک نوشته است.
جواد تاجی |۲۳ مرداد ۱۴۰۴ | ۱۰:۰۰
«ایگور بابوشکین»، همبنیانگذار استارتاپ هوش مصنوعی xAI متعلق به ایلان ماسک، روز چهارشنبه در پستی در شبکه اجتماعی ایکس از خروج خود از این شرکت خبر داد.
بابوشکین که مدیریت تیمهای مهندسی xAI را برعهده داشت، نقش مهمی در تبدیل این استارتاپ به یکی از توسعهدهندگان برجسته مدلهای هوش مصنوعی در سیلیکونولی ایفا کرده بود. او در پست خود نوشت:
«امروز آخرین روز من در xAI بود، شرکتی که در سال 2023 همراه با ایلان ماسک تأسیس کردم. هنوز روزی را که برای اولین بار با ایلان ملاقات کردم به یاد دارم؛ ساعتها درباره هوش مصنوعی و آیندهای که ممکن است در پیش باشد صحبت کردیم. هر دو احساس کردیم که نیاز به یک شرکت جدید با مأموریتی متفاوت وجود دارد.»
بابوشکین در پست خود توضیح میدهد که قصد دارد پس از ترک xAI، شرکت سرمایهگذاری خود با نام Babuschkin Ventures را راهاندازی کند. او توضیح میدهد که این شرکت از پژوهشهای مرتبط با ایمنی هوش مصنوعی حمایت خواهد کرد و به استارتاپهایی سرمایه میدهد که «به پیشرفت بشریت کمک میکنند و رازهای جهان را کشف میکنند.»
پیش از تأسیس xAI، بابوشکین عضو تیم پژوهشی گوگل دیپمایند بود که در سال 2019 سیستم AlphaStar را توسعه داد؛ یک پیشرفت مهم در حوزه هوش مصنوعی که توانست بر بازیکنان برتر بازی StarCraft غلبه کند. او همچنین پیشتر بهعنوان پژوهشگر در OpenAI فعالیت میکرد، پیش از آنکه این شرکت ChatGPT را عرضه کند.
توضیحات همبنیانگذار xAI درباره همکاری با ایلان ماسک
بابوشکین در پست خود به برخی از چالشهایی که همراه با ماسک در مسیر توسعه xAI تجربه کرده، اشاره کرده است. او میگوید برخی از متخصصان صنعت، هدف xAI برای ساخت ابررایانه این شرکت در ممفیس، تنسی، تنها در سه ماه را «غیرممکن» توصیف میکردند. بااینحال، این ابررایانه در مدتزمانی رکوردشکن ساخته شد.
او در پایان پست خود اضافه کرده:
«دو درس ارزشمند از ایلان یاد گرفتم: شماره یک، شجاع باش و آستین بالا بزن تا شخصاً درگیر حل مشکلات فنی شوی؛ شماره دو، حس فوریت دیوانهواری داشته باش.»
او درحالی از xAI خارج شده که این شرکت در ماههای اخیر با با چندین جنجال پیرامون چتبات خود، یعنی Grok، روبهرو شده است. برای مثال، مشخص شده بود که این چتبات هنگام پاسخ به پرسشهای بحثبرانگیز، از دیدگاههای شخصی ماسک استفاده میکند. در موردی دیگر، Grok اظهاراتی را در حمایت از هیتلر ارائه کرده بود.
اخیراً نیز xAI قابلیت جدیدی با نام Imagine را به Grok اضافه کرده که به کاربران اجازه میدهد ویدیوهای هوش مصنوعی تولید کنند. این قابلیت نیز با حواشی همراه بوده و برخی کاربران تصاویر عریان چهرههای شناخته شدهای چون «تیلور سوئیفت» را تولید کردهاند.

author: Rosie Jempson
title: 'I left the USSR to live on food stamps in the US - now I’m a millionaire entrepreneur' - US News - News - Daily Express US
text: 'I left the USSR to live on food stamps in the US - now I’m a millionaire entrepreneur' A millionaire entrepreneur has opened up about his experience of being born in the USSR and moving to the US to pursue the American dream. A Soviet-born man who [left the USSR](/news/world-news/129424/vladimir-putin-russia-expansion-kaliningrad-nato) to pursue the American dream became a self-made millionaire within years and is now sharing his business secrets. Sergiy Korelov, an interior designer and building contractor, built a comfortable life for himself in the States after winning the Green Card lottery. The 49-year-old entrepreneur was born in the USSR in the 70s. By 1991, the USSR had been split into 15 republics and life was harsh. Although happy and safe in a humble flat with his engineer father and cinema technician mother, communist ideology was all around - and in his early 20s, Sergiy entered the Green Card lottery in the hopes of starting a new life in the West. He said: "The propaganda was strong so you believe that you live in the best country in the world because you live in this bubble. But when the Soviet Union broke, the devastation of the economy was so severe that there was nothing on the shelves when you went shopping. READ MORE: [Putin's 'weak' forces would be crushed in war with NATO, top army chief warns](/news/world-news/129360/putin-army-russia-nato-war) "You’d have to get coupons from the government and stay in line for many hours to collect something. A mafia was on the rise at the time and it was a very rough period." Sergiy explains that, on his 25th birthday, he received a letter informing him that he was one of 50,000 winners - of roughly 10 million applicants. “I got this huge envelope and a seal from the United States government. It was like a movie. I was very shocked, excited, and confused, to be honest. Now I have to make this big decision: move to a completely new country, new territory, which I know very little about, or stay home." With just $1,500 dollars to his name, Sergiy, his pregnant wife Olga and their two-year-old daughter Eva flew to settle in Alaska. DON'T MISS: [American woman arrested by Putin's FSB thugs in Russia on suspicion of treason](/news/world-news/128419/la-woman-arrested-treason-russia-fsb-ukraine-war) [INSIGHT] [Nancy Pelosi slams 'grotesque' Donald Trump for 'holding up' vital Ukraine aid ](/news/politics/128290/nancy-pelosi-donald-trump-ukraine-aid) [COMMENT] [Joe Biden confuses Ukraine with NATO as fears over his mental fitness explode](/news/politics/128224/joe-biden-health-mental-fitness-ukraine-nato-funding) [INSIGHT] “We didn’t have any luggage, just a backpack. So, it was a rough move but so romantic and adventurous.” Unable to speak English and technically living in an “enemy territory” at the time, Sergiy explained that life was incredibly tough for the couple initially and they lodged with a Ukrainian friend for one month. Sergiy went on to become a part of the local church and eventually began leading Russian-speaking services after meeting other immigrants at the local Christian centre. He said that some locals were “suspicious” at first, but he went on to rise through the ranks at the parish and became senior pastor of the local church and vice president of a pastors’ network - as well as also being appointed as planning commissioner for the city of Wasilla. Follow Daily Express US on Google News Click [here](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAqBwgKMNDMhwsw4oHpAg?ceid=US%3Aen&oc=3) to follow [Daily Express US](/) on Google News to stay up to date with all the latest US, showbiz, and sports news. The first company he launched with a partner was called Joy Painting. He then went on to become a full-time building contractor, before importing design products from Europe and being invited to serve on the board of directors for a local builders’ association. Now months away from turning 50 and having established several successful businesses in the states. After almost nine years in Alaska, Sergiy moved his family to the warmer climates of [California](/latest/california) and enjoyed the rewards of his self-made success. Sergiy’s vision is to open an international business network and expand out to Canada and [Mexico](/latest/mexico). The long-term mission is to create embassy-style centres for business development and eventually introduce them to developing countries. author: Yucsiany Salazar Serrano
title: Video: Fuertes lluvias inundan calles de Santa Cruz - Diario Extra
text:
Video: Fuertes lluvias inundan calles de Santa Cruz No se reportan viviendas afectadas Un fuerte aguacero registrado en Santa Cruz generó saturación del sistema de alcantarillado, afectando principalmente el residencial Sagamad y la zona de Buenos Aires de Santa Cruz, según confirmó la Comisión Nacional de Emergencias (CNE).
“No hay ninguna vivienda afectada hasta el momento. Sin embargo, el Comité Comunal de Emergencias de la zona se mantiene activo ante cualquier situación”, indicó la CNE.
Además, se han recibido 5 reportes por precipitaciones en otras regiones del país :
2 de ellos provienen de San Isidro y Rincón de Cacao , en la provincia de Alajuela. Los 3 restantes corresponden a Orotina , Osa – Pérez Zeledón , donde también se han registrado aguaceros intensos. En imágenes que trascendieron se observa cómo las calles del cantón santacruceño lucen completamente inundadas.

author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: Warmest April Ever Fuelled Weather Extremes Across Globe: WMO
text:
The world experienced the warmest April ever and the eleventh consecutive month of record-high temperatures, the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) confirmed on Friday.
Sea surface temperatures have been record high for the past 13 months, it said.
The WMO said this is happening due to naturally occurring El Niño - unusual warming of waters in the central and eastern Pacific Ocean - and the additional energy trapped in the atmosphere and ocean by greenhouse gases from human activities.
A similar streak of record high temperatures happened previously during the strong El Niño event of 2015-2016.
The average temperature of 15.03 degrees Celsius in April was 1.58 degrees Celsius higher than the month's average for 1850-1900, the designated pre-industrial reference period, the WMO said citing data from the European climate agency - Copernicus Climate Change Service.
It was 0.67 degrees Celsius above the 1991-2020 average for April and 0.14 degrees Celsius above the previous high set in April 2016.
The record temperatures were accompanied by high-impact weather events - including intense heat in many parts of Asia, drought in southern Africa and extreme rainfall in the Arabian Peninsula. Persistent heavy rainfall in East Africa and southern Brazil has worsened in the first week of May, leading to devastating and deadly floods.
"The high number of extreme weather and climate events (including record daily and monthly temperatures and rainfall amounts) are more likely in a warmer world," WMO climate expert Alvaro Silva said.
"The sea surface temperature in several ocean basins, including in the tropical belt, continues to be record high, releasing more heat and moisture to the atmosphere and thus exacerbating conditions," he said.
There were big temperature differences within Europe in April. Outside Europe, temperatures were most above average over northern and northeastern North America, Greenland, eastern Asia, northwest Middle East, parts of South America, and most of Africa.
India suffered repeated heatwaves in April and the early part of May, with the India Meteorological Department issuing numerous advisories and warnings to protect people's health. The highest maximum temperature of 47.2 degrees Celsius had been recorded at Gangetic West Bengal on April 30. Schools were closed in Bangladesh as a safety precaution against the dangerous heat.
Thailand recorded many new station temperature records - for instance 44.1 degrees Celsius at Mueang Phetchabun Phetchabun on April 27, according to the Thailand Meteorological Department. In Myanmar there were also new temperature records of 48.2 degrees Celsius at Chauk.
It was predominantly wetter than average over most of north-western, central and north-eastern Europe. Most of southern Europe was drier than average, according to Copernicus.
Conditions were wetter than average over central, eastern and southern North America, across Central Asia, the Persian Gulf countries, easternmost Asia, eastern Australia, southern Brazil. Heavy rainfall often led to floods.

author: Geuis Geuis
title: Too many open files with nginx, can't seem to raise limit
text:
The server is Ubuntu 13.04 (GNU/Linux 3.9.3-x86_64-linode33 x86_64).
nginx is nginx/1.2.6.
I've been working on this for an several hours now, so here's what I'm getting and here's what I've done.
tail -f /usr/local/nginx/logs/error.log 2013/06/18 21:35:03 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:04 [crit] 3427#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files) 2013/06/18 21:35:05 [crit] 3426#0: accept4() failed (24: Too many open files)
Nginx running:
geuis@localhost:~$ ps aux | grep nginx root 3422 0.0 0.0 39292 380 ? Ss 21:30 0:00 nginx: master process /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx nobody 3423 3.7 18.8 238128 190848 ? S 21:30 0:13 nginx: worker process nobody 3424 3.8 19.0 236972 192336 ? S 21:30 0:13 nginx: worker process nobody 3426 3.6 19.0 235492 192192 ? S 21:30 0:13 nginx: worker process nobody 3427 3.7 19.0 236228 192432 ? S 21:30 0:13 nginx: worker process nobody 3428 0.0 0.0 39444 468 ? S 21:30 0:00 nginx: cache manager process
Modified soft/hard limits in /etc/security/limits.conf (settings from the end of the file)
root soft nofile 65536 root hard nofile 65536 www-data soft nofile 65536 www-data hard nofile 65536 nobody soft nofile 65536 nobody hard nofile 65536
A reading of the max files
cat /proc/sys/fs/file-max 500000
And in /etc/pam.d/common-session:
session required pam_limits.so
With this added and the server restarted for good measure, for nginx I count the soft/hard limits by getting the parent process's PID and:
cat /proc/<PID>/limits Limit Soft Limit Hard Limit Units Max open files 1024 4096 files
The parent process runs as 'root' and the 4 workers run as 'nobody'.
root 2765 0.0 0.0 39292 388 ? Ss 00:03 0:00 nginx: master process /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx nobody 2766 3.3 17.8 235336 180564 ? S 00:03 0:21 nginx: worker process nobody 2767 3.3 17.9 235432 181776 ? S 00:03 0:21 nginx: worker process nobody 2769 3.4 17.9 236096 181524 ? S 00:03 0:21 nginx: worker process nobody 2770 3.3 18.3 235288 185456 ? S 00:03 0:21 nginx: worker process nobody 2771 0.0 0.0 39444 684 ? S 00:03 0:00 nginx: cache manager process
I've tried everything I know how to do and have been able to get from Google. I cannot get the file limits for nginx to increase.
Help?

author: Óscar Chan
title: Yucatán: panaderías se preparan para grandes ventas por celebraciones del Día de Muertos
text: Yucatán: panaderías se preparan para grandes ventas por celebraciones del Día de Muertos Se espera un alza en las ventas de hasta un 30 por ciento en comparación a otras épocas del año. Empresarios de la industria panificadora en Yucatán ya se preparan para la elaboración y promoción de los panes de muerto en sus negocios a partir de la siguiente quincena, luego de que hace algunas semanas los supermercados y tiendas de autoservicio empezaran a comercializar este producto, como adelanto a las celebraciones del Día de Muertos. La empresaria panadera y ex delegada de la Cámara Nacional de la Industria Panificadora en Yucatán (Canainpa), Leticia Pech Gamboa, destacó que se tienen buenas expectativas para las celebraciones a los fieles difuntos, ya que representan una de las épocas más fuertes del año, junto con la temporada decembrina. Agregó que actualmente las tiendas de autoservicio y supermercados se adelantan demasiado en cuanto a la oferta de los panes de muerto en sus vitrinas, por lo que prácticamente las panaderías locales se ven obligadas a competir con ellas. Por ello, en los próximos días se encontrarán estos productos en sus negocios. Consideró que dada la “vida acelerada” y la llegada de personas de otros estados a residir a la entidad, se ha propiciado que las tradiciones se adelanten demasiado, desde hace unos cuatro o cinco años. Compartió que ahora las temporadas llegan con dos o tres meses de anticipación y son marcadas particularmente por las cadenas comerciales, franquicias o tiendas de autoservicio. Sin embargo, a pesar de esta situación precisó que estiman un alza en las ventas de hasta un 30 por ciento en comparación a otras épocas del año y destacó que el “pico más fuerte” se comenzará a presentar con las celebraciones del Día de Muertos y se “empatará” con la temporada decembrina. Compartió que a la par del incremento en la demanda de panes de muerto, también se tendría un ligero repunte en el servicio de horneado de pibes, el cual tiene un costo de 70 pesos por charola mediana, sin que se contempla un alza en el precio para este año. También te puede interesar: [Orgullo yucateco: el pan cubano de Tizimín conquista los paladares en Francia](#/posts/64890c0a9f852500130f0937/edit) [Piden a las panaderías de Yucatán no subir los precios](#/posts/63d02bfd3a6b1d001315dc67/edit)

author: BOL
title: Multidão de evangélicos toma ruas de São Paulo na Marcha para Jesus - Notícias - BOL
text:
Multidão de evangélicos toma ruas de São Paulo na Marcha para Jesus 30/05/2024 18h01
Uma maré azul de centenas de milhares de fiéis evangélicos tomou nesta quinta-feira (30) as ruas de São Paulo na Marcha para Jesus, um evento com forte dimensão política, além do seu aspecto religioso.
Com os braços para o alto e olhos fechados, os participantes dançaram, cantaram e rezaram, vestindo camisetas azuis com o logotipo da 32ª edição da Marcha.
Uma grande bandeira de Israel foi levada pela multidão, um símbolo do forte apoio do movimento evangélico e ultraconservador do Brasil àquele país, em meio ao conflito com o movimento islamita Hamas na Faixa de Gaza.
A Marcha também aconteceu em meio ao aumento da tensão entre Israel e o governo do presidente Lula, que retirou ontem seu embaixador em Tel Aviv, que não será substituído.
O evento ganhou tons políticos nos últimos anos, com o crescimento da comunidade cristã evangélica brasileira, que se tornou cada vez mais influente, principalmente durante o mandato do ex-presidente Jair Bolsonaro (2019-2022).
Na manhã de hoje, os fiéis deixaram o centro da cidade e se dirigiram a uma grande praça localizada cinco quilômetros ao norte, onde astros brasileiros do gospel fizeram um show durante toda a tarde.
"Isso é uma experiência! Quando a gente vem uma vez, não deixa mais de vir", disse a pastora Gislene Alves, 60.
A empresária Raimunda Gonçalves da Silva, 29, compareceu para rezar "pelas pessoas necessitadas, pelo Rio Grande do Sul e por Israel também".
Lula não participou da Marcha, mas enviou um representante do governo, e a presidência divulgou uma mensagem em seu nome: "Como cristão, sinto-me regozijado de ver a dimensão extraordinária que esse evento tomou e o papel significativo que ele desempenha na vida de muitos brasileiros."
O prefeito de direita de São Paulo, Ricardo Nunes, que buscará um novo mandato nas eleições de outubro, dirigiu-se aos fiéis: "Que essa marcha possa sair daqui para entrar em muitas casas. Estou muito feliz por estar aqui, eu amo Jesus Cristo, amo vocês", disse o aliado de Bolsonaro.
Os brasileiros evangélicos representam cerca de um terço dos 203 milhões de habitantes do país, mas alguns líderes religiosos afirmam que eles serão a maioria dentro de dez anos.

author: @zazoomblog
title: Piogge vento e neve nel weekend Poi il 'Ciclone della Befana' rincara la dose
text:
Piogge vento e neve nel weekend Poi il ‘Ciclone della Befana’ rincara la dose
Roma, 3 gennaio 2025 – Il nuovo anno porta con sé una ventata di freddo gelido sull’Italia: le correnti nord atlantiche con Piogge e perturbazioni sono già in transito sul Paese. A parlarne è Antonio Sanò, fondatore del sito ilMeteo.it, che specifica che la prima perturbazione dell’anno è partita dalla Romagna ed è diretta verso il Sud. Cosa succederà nelle prossime ore I primi ‘obiettivi colpiti’ di questo fronte, collegato ad una vasta area di bassa pressione polare centrata sul Mar Baltico, sono la Romagna, le Marche, la Toscana e il Lazio, che stanno già subendo precipitazioni. 3BMeteo specifica che accumuli pluviometrici di oltre 20mm sono attesi sull'Appennino pistoiese. Il maltempo si sposterà quindi verso le restanti regioni del Centro e tra Campania e Basilicata. In serata sarà la volta di Puglia e Alta Calabria.Leggi su Quotidiano.net
